Service Details: - Provides self-help recovery club for people recovering from stroke and their caregivers- Offers weekly meeting that includes coffee, exercise, lunch and socializing, a speaker or activity such as mental aerobics, games, crafts, and bowling
Cost: The program costs $22 per year to cover room rental, coffee, and outings.
Meetings: - Meetings Thursdays from 11:00am - 2:30pm @ St. Aidan's Anglican Church (380 Leathead Rd, Kelowna)- Bring your own bag lunch- Refreshments served
Address & Map: St Aidan's Anglican Church380 Leathead RdKelowna, BC     V1X 2H8View MapQuest Map
Major Intersection: Leathead Rd and Dougall Rd N
